wiktionary_senses.definition: A tool for felling trees or chopping wood etc. consisting of a heavy head flattened to a blade on one side, and a handle attached to it.
An ancient weapon consisting of a head that has one or two blades and a long handle.
A gigging musician's particular instrument, especially a guitar in rock music or a saxophone in jazz.
A position, interest, or reason in buying and selling stock, often with ulterior motives.
To fell or chop with an axe.
To lay off, terminate or drastically reduce, especially in a rough or ruthless manner; to cancel.
A river in Dorset, Somerset, and east Devon, England, which flows into Lyme Bay at Seaton.
A river in Somerset, England, which flows into the Bristol Channel at Weston-super-Mare.
